Community Resources

Discussion chat room

WirePlumber does not have its own discussion room, but we hang out in the generic PipeWire IRC room, which is bridged to Matrix. Join us:

  • via IRC: #pipewire on irc.oftc.net

  • via Matrix: #pipewire:matrix.org

Mailing list

For discussions related to PipeWire development, there is the pipewire-devel mailing list

Reporting issues

If you have found an issue with WirePlumber and wish to report it, please create a ticket on GitLab

Please always check that your issue is not already reported before reporting it.
